Label.en: Well, since I am a clever owl, I have one idea!
Label.fr: Eh bien, comme je suis une chouette maline, j'ai une idée !
Label.es: Well, since I am a clever owl, I have one idea!

Label.en: We know from sketches that they were intended to go on the bottom of the monument
Label.fr: Nous savons grâce à des croquis qu'ils étaient destinés à être placés au bas du monument
Label.es: We know from sketches that they were intended to go on the bottom of the monument

Label.en: So, perhaps they are sinners being punished?
Label.fr: Donc peut-être qu'ils étaient des pécheurs qui devaient être punis ?
Label.es: So, perhaps they are sinners being punished?

Label.en: They could be representations of provinces conquered by the papacy?
Label.fr: Ils pourraients être des représentations des provinces conquises par la papauté
Label.es: They could be representations of provinces conquered by the papacy?

Label.en: Anyway… they were actually left off the final version of the mausoleum, supposedly due to spacing issues!
Label.fr: Quoiqu'il en soit, ils ont été finalement enlevés de la version finale du mausolée, apparemment à cause de problèmes de place !
Label.es: Anyway… they were actually left off the final version of the mausoleum, supposedly due to spacing issues!

Label.en: So Michelangelo gave them to his friend, Roberto Strozzi!
Label.fr: Donc Michel-Ange les donna à son ami, Roberto Strozzi !
Label.es: So Michelangelo gave them to his friend, Roberto Strozzi!

Label.en: And now, the Louvre has them!
Label.fr: Et maintenant, elles sont exposées au Louvre !
Label.es: And now, the Louvre has them!
